channel.title: Bluesky on Deuts Log
channel.description: Recent content in Bluesky on Deuts Log

item.title: @deuts.hamili.net 3leavdh57as2h
item.description: I liked the new look of #Bitwarden. You can now open the Chrome extension in a new windows even if you’ve already opened one of your accounts. Great for editing.
item.content:encoded: I liked the new look of #Bitwarden. You can now open the Chrome extension in a new windows even if you’ve already opened one of your accounts. Great for editing.

item.title: @deuts.hamili.net 3ldzbp43gss2m
item.description: Shouldn’t it be the Galaxy doesn’t care?
item.content:encoded: Shouldn’t it be the Galaxy doesn’t care?

item.title: @deuts.hamili.net 3ldvovcqdi22t
item.description: My single user #GoToSocial instance is getting even bigger at 2.6gb, even though I didn’t really have much activities in the last 2 days. I wonder how big it’s really gonna get in say 6 months? I wonder how bigger it would have been if it were a single user instance of #Mastodon?
item.content:encoded: My single user #GoToSocial instance is getting even bigger at 2.6gb, even though I didn’t really have much activities in the last 2 days. I wonder how big it’s really gonna get in say 6 months? I wonder how bigger it would have been if it were a single user instance of #Mastodon?

item.title: @deuts.hamili.net 3ldvo6t5ruk2t
item.description: I think I have too many Subreddit subscriptions. It’s time to leave some groups and narrow them down to the ones that truly interest me. #Reddit
item.content:encoded: I think I have too many Subreddit subscriptions. It’s time to leave some groups and narrow them down to the ones that truly interest me. #Reddit

item.title: @deuts.hamili.net 3ldvnvez5f22t
item.description: My days of distrohopping is done. Nowadays, it’s only Debian or Ubuntu for server, and probably Debian, Pop!_OS or Linux Mint for desktop. Of course Windows will always be there because I’m a power #Excel user.
item.content:encoded: My days of distrohopping is done. Nowadays, it’s only Debian or Ubuntu for server, and probably Debian, Pop!_OS or Linux Mint for desktop. Of course Windows will always be there because I’m a power #Excel user.

item.title: @deuts.hamili.net 3ldv7siwspc2d
item.description: TSDProxy is making great strides, I just don’t know how to incorporate it in my workflow www.reddit.com/∞ #Tailscale
item.content:encoded: TSDProxy is making great strides, I just don’t know how to incorporate it in my workflow www.reddit.com/∞ #Tailscale

item.title: @deuts.hamili.net 3ldpdw4vwi22n
item.description: My request for #BlueSky is to add the functionality to follow hashtags as well, just like how you can do in the #Fediverse and #Mastodon.
item.content:encoded: My request for #BlueSky is to add the functionality to follow hashtags as well, just like how you can do in the #Fediverse and #Mastodon.
